Pushing avg into set
------
319 313 312 294 307 298 305 291 255 283 285 222 261 300 203 251 267 187 234 280 273 277 207 198 127 108 177 183 205 63 168 120 213 239 46 152 115 230 183 168 217 246 80 239 244 157 144 187 138 63 51 93 100 87 21 125 125 172 81 61 55 25 72 12 12 30 167 80 224 6 4 121 23 106 69 135 17 35 114 60 141 99 30 46 78 36 74 192 162 131 178 114 150 41 109 165 138 91 131 63 150

--------

Resorting Heap
-----
4 6 12 12 17 21 23 25 30 30 35 36 41 46 46 51 55 60 61 63 63 63 69 72 74 78 80 80 81 87 91 93 99 100 106 108 109 114 114 115 120 121 125 125 127 131 131 135 138 138 141 144 150 150 152 157 162 165 167 168 168 172 177 178 183 183 187 187 192 198 203 205 207 213 217 222 224 230 234 239 239 244 246 251 255 261 267 273 277 280 283 285 291 294 298 300 305 307 312 313 




Functions:


void print(std::vector<int> const &v)
* Function to print out ints


int fillVector()
* Randomize ints


Std::generate
* Creates pool of numbers


Std::random_shuffle
* Shuffles the numbers


Std::accumulate 
* Shortcut to find avg of numbers


Make_heap
* Transform numbers to heap format 
* Puts largest numbers in the beginning of set and smallest in the back


Push_back
* Pushes in to back of set


Pop_heap
* Pops element at end of set
Sort_heap
* Organizes data from min to max
